eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A 911 TELEPHONE OUTAGE EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Marion, FL; AT 02:27 PM ON NOV 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:27 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The 911 system is down. In an emergency, please TEXT 911. If you have an emergency, send a text message to 911 with your location and the nature of your emergency. Our dispatchers are ready to assist you. We will provide updates as this situation is resolved. Please stay safe and share this information with others.
